issue.title: [CF 757] Changing icon over duration
issue.body:
Hello, i have one question. Can you help me?

I have a timer for spell (Amber Explosion on "Riolite") and i need that icon to change over duration.
Formula 6*(2n+1) second before end of timer - first icon, 6*2n - second icon. Or different icons will be showed at this time instead changing icon.

Sorry for my bad english


> Posted by CurseForge user Antiteemon | Imported from CurseForge issue #757 | Raw

comments.body:
Sorry, but I really can't figure out what you are trying to set up here.

What I will suggest is that you play around with the Duration Requirements settings for your icons, and to try to combine those icons into a meta icon.

Feel free to reply with a more detailed explanation of what you are trying to do if you are still having trouble.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
